'''Emily''' is the sister of [[Sarah Freemont]].

==History==
After [[Izzie Stevens]] made a mistake when treating Sarah, she was flown down to Los Angeles to receive a kidney transplant from her sister. Emily couldn't travel to Seattle because she had three small children and her ex-husband is abusive. Emily had been tested as a partial match three years prior. At the time, that wasn't good enough, but since Sarah's condition had declined, they decided to use it. Emily tried to get them to skip the pre-operative tests, but Bailey said they needed to let her rest and get assurances that Sarah was strong enough for the transplant. During the testing, they discovered that Emily was infected with HIV. She was aware of that and hoped they'd still be able to do the transplant because Sarah had no other option. She said she'd rather get AIDS than die. Because of the anti-rejection drugs she'd have to take for the kidney, the doctors believed she had the potential to develop full-blown AIDS quickly.

When Sarah's organs started shutting down, Bailey appealed to Charlotte to do the transplant with Emily's kidney. Charlotte agreed to try to get a team together. Once the team was put together, Bailey asked them all again if they were sure they were willing to participate. [[Tommy (Right Here, Right Now)|One member]] of the team backed out. Without him, Charlotte said the surgery couldn't go on. However, Sam stepped in, saying he'd done a surgical residency, and he'd take the open place.

The surgery went on and Sarah went into pericardial tamponade. Sam did a pericardiocentesis to relieve the pressure, which was successful, allowing them to complete the transplant.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
Her ex-husband is abusive, which led to their divorce.

===Familial===
When she left her abusive husband, her sister, Sarah, came to live with her for six months to make sure Emily and her daughters were safe.

Her oldest child is Lily, whom she says has the biggest eyes you've ever seen. She also has two other young children.

==Notes and Trivia==
*Her blood type is AB+.
*She's a scorpio.
